search.title: PCI Express
search.snippet: PCI Express (Peripheral Component Interconnect Express), officially abbreviated as PCIe, is a high-speed standard used to connect hardware components inside

search.title: Peripheral Component Interconnect

search.title: NVM Express
search.snippet: accessing a computer's non-volatile storage media usually attached via the PCI Express bus. The initial NVM stands for non-volatile memory, which is often NAND
